reasoning: The high-level goal is to plan for the looping execution of 'La Metta, Dima, Kick, Fizz and Fozz'. This requires breaking down the overall objective into smaller, manageable tasks. The plan should leverage the unique skills of each team member, ensuring that their roles and goals are integrated into the task execution. The process begins with identifying the core steps (TAS) by the 'Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor' roles, followed by prompt engineering to refine instructions, design, development, and finally, the execution and promotion aspects. The looping nature implies a need for iterative refinement and continuous execution, which should be reflected in the task dependencies and ordering.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts 'Task Agnostic Steps' (TAS) towards a high-level goal.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Generates web development code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) based on user requests, ensuring modern design principles, responsiveness, and functionality.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generates aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implements designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Lyricist
roles.description: Crafts compelling and evocative lyrics for music.

roles.title: Music Designer
roles.description: Manages sound definition and sonic engineering for music tracks.

roles.title: Distribution and Promotion Agent
roles.description: Manages digital distribution, music marketing, and audience engagement for music.

roles.title: Coordinator
roles.description: Oversees and synchronizes the execution of tasks.
